title: Rider Protests, Foul Weather Clouds Mountainous 16th Stage of Giro d’Italia: ‘This Will be a Sh*t Show’
content:
Peloton votes unanimously against Giro d'Italia organizer's decision to push on with storm-addled stage 16 in pre-ride chaos Tuesday morning.

Read the full article at Rider Protests, Foul Weather Clouds Mountainous 16th Stage of Giro d’Italia: ‘This Will be a Sh*t Show’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
